description:
It looks like Disney Plus had to make a difficult decision regarding one of their newest shows. The streaming service chose to cancel a series after producing only one season for their platform. Of course, the Disney Plus series was considered controversial during its run, so this might not be too surprising. The show’s themes [...]

The post Disney Plus Cancels Controversial Series After One Season appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Disney Plus Cancels Controversial Series After One Season
